author: Melanie Grayce West
title: A ‘Firefighter’s Firefighter’ Is Remembered During Funeral at St. Patrick’s
text:
A New York City firefighter who died last week battling a fire was remembered Tuesday as a devoted father, the cornerstone of his community and a “firefighter’s firefighter,” said the mayor during a funeral Mass at St. Patrick’s Cathedral in Manhattan.
Michael R. Davidson, 37 years old, a 15-year veteran of the fire department and a native of Queens, died while responding to a fire on March 22 at a film set in Harlem. A nozzleman, Mr. Davidson was the first into the burning building, but became separated from his fellow firefighters....
